greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of psi(x^2) * f(x^3, x^5) in powers of x where psi(), f(, ) are Ramanujan theta functions.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Number of solutions to 16*n + 5 = (8*u + 1)^2 + (8*v + 2)^2 where u,v in Z.
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ -x^2, x^8] QPochhammer[ -x^3, x^8] QPochhammer[ -x^5, x^8] QPochhammer[ -x^6, x^8] QPochhammer[x^8]^2, {x, 0, n}];
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jun 23 2015
